title: Simple loop conjecture for discrete representations in PSL$(2,\,\mathbb R)$
abstract: We show that the Simple Loop Conjecture holds for any representation $ρ\colonπ_1(S)\longrightarrow \text{PSL}(2,\,\mathbb R)$ that is discrete but not faithful. That is, we show the existence of a simple closed curve in the kernel of such a representation.
comment: We have decided to withdraw this paper due to a mistake in the main result. A counterexample to the principal theorem has come to our attention, invalidating the statement as originally formulated. We hope to upload a corrected version in the future
